brief_title: Intracellular Pharmacokinetics of Zidovudine Triphosphate in Maternal and Infant Cord Blood Mononuclear Cells.
brief_summary: To determine the levels of zidovudine triphosphate ( AZT-TP ) in maternal and fetal cord blood mononuclear cells. To determine the ratio of AZT-TP to endogenous nucleoside triphosphate levels in maternal and fetal cells. To determine the extent of drug transfer through the feto/placental unit.
